channel.title: WebIOPi on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in WebIOPi on Memo Tut

item.title: I couldn't escape from the futon, so I made a fully automatic futon peeler.
item.description: # Overview It is known that escaping from the futon by itself on a cold winter morning is accompanied by a great deal of mental distress, and a decline in activity in the morning in the winter brings a great loss to the Japanese economy. I don’t know if this is the case, but for the time being, if I leave home early in the morning, my graduation will be jeopardized, so I decided to take measures.
